name: Emotionless
description:
How would you know about emotion if you lost your ability to feel? 

emotionless is an exploration adventure game that takes place in a 3D spherical world. You can't remember anything, but there is a voice guiding you, trying to let you find your "self". You will find your "self" on your adventure, But is it that easy? 

Something is lost and can't be found, however, we have to keep the parts that make us human, and never lose them.

[ Controls]

Use Arrow keys, WASD, or any supported PC Gamepads

( Xbox Controller Supported with Rumble )

[ Creators]

Sam Feng - Programming - @samfenggames

Eizi Yu - Level Design - https://eizimailcom.itch.io/

Jose Salas - Story & Designs - @salas_games

Franco Toledo - Music & Sounds - @shawntrrttll

[ Note ]

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2021.
